name: Central Blob
description: Initializes a grid with a centered rectangular region of random boolean states (active/inactive), with all other cells inactive, creating a localized blob of activity for cellular automata experiments.

name: Central Square
description: Initializes a grid with a centered square region of active states, with all other cells inactive, creating a localized active area for cellular automata experiments.

name: Centered Disk
description: Initializes a grid with a disk-shaped region of active cells centered in the grid, with all other cells inactive, suitable for diffusion experiments like NAIVE-DIFFUSION.

name: Histogram Baseline
description: Initializes a grid with a random distribution of active and inactive cells (50% probability, echo=false) and a fixed active baseline at the bottom row (value=true, echo=true) for inhibition, suitable for rules like SAFE-PASS.

name: Random Boolean Soup
description: Initializes a grid with a random distribution of live and dead cells (50% probability each), creating a chaotic initial configuration for cellular automata experiments.

name: Random Species Distribution
description: Initializes a grid with a random distribution of active cells (up to a specified population) assigned species IDs (1 to numSpecies), with remaining cells inactive (ID 0), designed for species-based cellular automata rules.

name: Random Spots Placement
description: Initializes a grid by placing a specified number of active cells at random positions, with all other cells inactive, creating sparse patterns with isolated active regions.
